name: places/ChIJYSZagNj1wokRcZxI1OANDpY
adrFormatAddress: 2289 5th Ave, New York, NY 10037-1799, USA

originalText.text: When my son was 3 years old that's 13 years ago, this school was the best school i could asked for. They took care of my son and helped him with his issues and he has excelled today. A top student who has been on principal's list and honor roll since he started kindergarten. Love this school and would recommend it to anyone

text.text: When my son was 3 years old that's 13 years ago, this school was the best school i could asked for. They took care of my son and helped him with his issues and he has excelled today. A top student who has been on principal's list and honor roll since he started kindergarten. Love this school and would recommend it to anyone

originalText.text:
This school has horrible conditions.
I had appointment to Meet the director Ms.Gordon Celeste for school observation.
The appointment was made in advance.
I appeared infront of 2289 5th ave to unlock doors open to the public, no security or cameras at entrance. There no staff to greet you on the way in. Anyond can walk in and out
Which is a major safety concern.Children were running around out of classrooms. teachers or voluteer helpers they look like notice me but didnt care to ask if I needed help. The hallway has no lights very dark inside center dirty floors the bathroom had no lights or toilet paper. As I look for my way back out a couple staff just was looking but didn't care who I was along side with my child. (Major concern)
The staff at the front door which was the lady smoking a cigarette ,ask who or what did I want with attitude. talking about my child and I said where is Ms Gordon.
She had no clue where ms. Gordon was so I left. About 3 minute a lady walks up to me at the bus stop states she Celeste GORDON. I kindly said no thank you I'll find somewhere else.
I refuse to settle for less concerning my son education.
The board of education should do back round check seriously... no recommendation needed here

originalText.text: Great school great staff they are very welcoming.
